Description: Located in the Clam Point section of Dorchester. This 3 Bedroom Apartment features hardwood flooring, stainless steel appliances, dish washer, microwave, granite kitchen counter tops, washing machine and dryer. The bathroom features marble counter tops and flooring, nickel plated fixtures, and a Jacuzzi tub, a ceiling light. Close to beach, grocery store and shops. A+ location. Across the street from Byrne Playground. Condo Quality unit. THESE PICS ARE OF THE UPSTAIRS UNIT, BOTH UNITS ARE IDENTICAL
